title: (x) Vertigo - hand drawn by Saul Bass {David Hamuel, BJ Harvey}
content: This comes from the Vertigo movie poster. I would appreciate knowing if there is a font and if so where I can get it. Thanks.\
author: amabanda

dunno if a font was made from this.

One Matt Terich created [this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134559/http:/www.saulbass.net/hitchcock.zip) (available for free from saulbass.net) based on Saul Bass' hand printing. It's not very similar to the Vertigo titles but might also be of interest for you...   
   
A Mac version is also available on the same site.

what happened there, I don't know?

This kinda stuff should be handlettered anyway IMHO.   
There are a number of freeware/shareware fonts that   
have that same angular handdrawn quality.

Well technically it wasn't really your ID. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134559im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/wink.gif)   
Identifications for custom/commissioned designs   
only get credited when someone can pinpoint by   
whom the design is. This means a number of IDs   
which we are almost 100% sure of they're custom   
don't get regarded as positive IDs. This hurts our   
stats, BUT I think it's fairer.   
   
BJ was the first poster who mentionned Saul Bass,   
so he gets credited. You get co-credited solely   
because I'm in a good mood today. Consider this   
"abuse of power". So sue me. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110430134559im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/lol.gif)
